name: Treadmill
description: High-performance treadmill with multiple speed settings. Supports incline adjustments for intense workouts. Sturdy build for long-lasting durability.

name: Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbell set for versatile strength training. Durable and ergonomic design for a comfortable grip. Ideal for both beginners and pros.

name: Protein Powder
description: Premium whey protein for muscle recovery and strength. Packed with essential amino acids and low in sugar. Enhances performance and supports lean muscle growth.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning for comfort. Sweat-resistant surface for better grip during workouts. Lightweight and easy to carry.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with superior cushioning. Breathable mesh upper for better airflow and comfort. Ideal for long-distance running and casual wear.

name: Sports T-Shirt
description: Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry and fresh. Stretchable, breathable, and designed for high performance. Perfect for training, running, or everyday use.

name: Boxing Gloves
description: Durable boxing gloves with shock-absorbing padding. Velcro strap for a secure and comfortable fit. Designed for training, sparring, and competitions.

name: Football
description: FIFA-certified match-quality football. Made with durable material for long-lasting play. Great for training and competitive matches.

name: Compression Leggings
description: Tight-fit compression leggings for muscle support. Reduces fatigue and enhances blood circulation. Ideal for gym, yoga, and running.

name: Water Bottle
description: BPA-free sports water bottle with a leak-proof lid. Keeps your drinks cold or hot for hours. Essential for hydration during workouts.

name: Kettlebell
description: Cast iron kettlebell for functional strength training. Ergonomic handle with textured grip for secure handling. Perfect for swings, squats, and deadlifts.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitor and GPS. Tracks steps, calories, sleep, and exercise sessions. Water-resistant and long battery life.

name: Jump Rope
description: Adjustable speed jump rope with comfortable handles. Ball bearings for smooth rotation and tangle-free design. Great for cardio and HIIT workouts.

name: Resistance Bands
description: Set of five resistance bands with different tension levels. Made with durable latex for long-lasting performance. Includes carrying bag and exercise guide.

name: Pre-Workout Supplement
description: Energy-boosting pre-workout formula with creatine and beta-alanine. Improves focus, endurance, and performance. Sugar-free and available in multiple flavors.

name: Weight Bench
description: Adjustable weight bench for multiple exercise positions. Supports flat, incline, and decline positions. Sturdy construction with padded cushioning for comfort.

name: Basketball
description: Official size and weight basketball with superior grip. Durable rubber exterior suitable for indoor and outdoor play. Excellent ball handling and shooting precision.

name: Cycling Shorts
description: Padded cycling shorts with moisture-wicking fabric. Reduces friction and enhances comfort during long rides. Elastic waistband for a secure fit.

name: Pull-Up Bar
description: Door-mounted pull-up bar with multiple grip positions. Easy installation with no screws required. Supports various upper body exercises and up to 300 lbs.

name: Meal Prep Containers
description: BPA-free meal prep containers with leak-proof lids. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for portion control and healthy eating on the go.
